Use Voucher to Get More Savings

Apply the Best Code to Your Cart!

Universal Voucher

5%

  • · 5% off for all orders
  • · Applites to all products
  • · Unlimited usage time

Code：UG5

$20

  • · $20 off for order over $129
  • · Applites to all products
  • · Unlimited usage time

Code：UG20

  • · Applites to all products
  • · Unlimited usage time

Code：UG35

How to Use

1

Select Voucher Category

2

Click the
“ Copy Code ” Button

3

Buy Products to Enjoy Corresponding Discounts

<style>
/*Voucher Banner style*/
.ug_Voucher_banner {
	position: relative;
}

.ug_Voucher_banner img {
	width: 100%;
}

.ug_Voucher_banner .ug_Voucher_banner_mol {
	display: none;
}

.ug_Voucher_banner .ug_Voucher_banner_box {
	position: absolute;
	top: 20%;
	left: 50%;
	transform: translateX(-50%);
  text-align: center;
}

.ug_Voucher_banner .ug_Voucher_banner_box h1 {
	font-weight: 700;
	font-size: 2.083vw;
	color: #000;
}

.ug_Voucher_banner .ug_Voucher_banner_box p {
	font-size: 1.042vw;
	color: #666666;
	margin: 0.521vw 0 0 0;
}
/*Universal Voucher Style*/
.universal_voucher{
	position: relative;
	margin-top: -10.2vw;
	padding-bottom: 2vw;
}
.universal_voucher h2{
	font-weight: 700;
	font-size: 1.875vw;
	text-align: center;
	margin-bottom: 2.083vw;
}
.universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box{
	display: flex;
	max-width: 66.667vw;
	margin: 0 auto;
	justify-content: space-between;
}
.universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list {
	width: 100%;
    max-width: 20.833vw;
    border-radius: 0.208vw;
    transition: all 0.3s;
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgb(0 0 0 / 8%);
}
.universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list:hover{
	box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgb(0 0 0 / 48%);
}
.universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list .price{
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 2.083vw 1.875vw;
    background: linear-gradient(180deg, #FB2A22 0%, #FFBB00 188.89%);
    justify-content: space-between;
}
.universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list .price p{
	font-family: 'Lato'!important;
	font-weight: 700;
	font-size: 3.542vw;
	margin: 0;
	color: #FFFFFF;
	line-height: 3.542vw;
}
.universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list .price p span{
	font-size: 1.875vw;
	position: relative;
	top: -1.302vw;
}
.universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list ul{
	padding: 0;
	margin: 0;
}
.universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list ul li{
	font-size: 0.729vw;
	line-height: 1.146vw;
	color: #FFFFFF;
}
.universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list .code{
	display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
	padding: 0.625vw 1.875vw;
	background: linear-gradient(0deg, #000000, #000000), linear-gradient(90deg, #FB2A22 10.04%, #FFE3BF 66.16%, #FFFFFF 105.5%);
}
.universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list .code p{
	margin: 0;
	font-size: 0.833vw;
	color: #FFFFFF;
}
.universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list .code button{
	padding: 0.46875vw 0;
	width: 8.333vw;
	text-align: center;
	font-weight: 600;
	font-size: 0.833vw;
	color: #000000;
	transition: all 0.3s;
	background: #FFFFFF;
	border-radius: 3.125vw;
}
.universal_voucher .universal_voucher_box .universal_voucher_list .code button:hover{
	background: #00CC88;
	color: #FFFFFF;
}
/*Product Voucher Style*/
.product_voucher{
	padding: 4.25vw 0 5.208vw 0;
}
.product_voucher h2{
	font-weight: 700;
	font-size: 1.875vw;
	text-align: center;
}
.product_voucher .product_voucher_box{
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 1310px;
    overflow: hidden;
    margin: 0 auto;
    position: relative;
}
.product_voucher .product_voucher_box .voucher_tabs{
	display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: flex-start;
    margin: 2.604vw 0;
}
.product_voucher .product_voucher_box .voucher_tabs .clickBtn{
	width: 9.479vw;
	text-align: center;
	opacity: .5;
	transition: all 0.3s;
}
.product_voucher .product_voucher_box .voucher_tabs .clickBtn:hover{
	cursor: pointer;
	opacity: 1;
}
.product_voucher .product_voucher_box .voucher_tabs .clickBtn p{
	margin: 0.78125vw 0 0 0;
	font-weight: 600;
	font-size: 0.833vw;
	color: #000000;
}
.product_voucher .product_voucher_box .voucher_tabs .clickBtn.active{
	opacity: 1;
}
.product_voucher .product_voucher_box .content {
	display: flex;
	transition: all 0.5s;
}
.product_voucher .product_voucher_box .content>.item {
	width: 100%;
	max-width: 1310px;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	display: flex;
	justify-content: center;
	padding-bottom: 1.042vw;
}
.product_voucher .product_code_list{
	text-align: center;
	box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgb(0 0 0 / 8%);

	margin: 0.833vw;
	width: 100%;
    max-width: 15.625vw;

}
.product_voucher .product_code_list:hover{
	 box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgb(0 0 0 / 16%);
}
.product_voucher .product_code_list .price{
	padding: 1.823vw 1.979vw 1.302vw 1.979vw;
	background: linear-gradient(180deg, #FFFFFF 38.34%, #FFF2F2 79.18%);
}
.product_voucher .product_code_list .price p{
	font-family: 'Lato'!important;
	font-weight: 700;
	font-size: 3.542vw;
	margin: 0;
	line-height: 3.542vw;
	background: linear-gradient(180deg, #FB2A22 0%, #FFBB00 188.89%);
	-webkit-background-clip: text;
    color: transparent;
}
.product_voucher .product_code_list .price p span{
	font-size: 1.875vw;
	position: relative;
	top: -1.302vw;
	background: linear-gradient(180deg, #FB2A22 0%, #FFBB00 188.89%);
	-webkit-background-clip: text;
    color: transparent;
}
.product_voucher .product_code_list .price ul{
	padding: 0;
	margin: 0;
}
.product_voucher .product_code_list .price ul li{
	font-size: 0.729vw;
	line-height: 1.146vw;
	color: #727273;
}
.product_voucher .product_code_list .code{
	padding: 1.042vw;
}
.product_voucher .product_code_list .code p{
	margin-bottom: 0.625vw;
	font-size: 0.833vw;
	color: #727273;
}
.product_voucher .product_code_list .code button{
	padding: 0.46875vw 0;
	width: 8.333vw;
	text-align: center;
	font-weight: 600;
	font-size: 0.833vw;
	color: #ffffff;
	transition: all 0.3s;
	background: linear-gradient(180deg, #FB2A22 0%, #FFBB00 188.89%);
	border-radius: 3.125vw;
}
.product_voucher .product_code_list .code button:hover{
	background: #000000;
	color: #FFFFFF;
}
/*How to Use Style*/
.how_to_use{
	padding: 6.25vw 0;
	background: #F8F8F9;
	position: relative;
}
.how_to_use h2{
	font-weight: 700;
	font-size: 1.875vw;
	text-align: center;
	margin-bottom: 2.083vw;
}
.how_to_use .how_to_use_box{
	width: 100%;
    max-width: 53.125vw;
    margin: 0 auto;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: flex-start;
}
.how_to_use .how_to_use_box .box_List{
	text-align: center;
	width: 100%;
	max-width: 15.625vw;
}
.how_to_use .how_to_use_box>div:last-child span:after {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	bottom: 0;
	right: -0.260vw;
	z-index: 5;
	width: 1.042vw;
	height: 1.042vw;
	background: url("https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/step3_icon.svg?v=1672911774")center center/100% no-repeat;
	border-radius: 50%;
}
.how_to_use .how_to_use_box .box_List span{
	display: inline-block;
	width: 2.083vw;
	height: 2.083vw;
	line-height: 2.083vw;
	text-align: center;
	background: #000;
	border-radius: 50%;

	font-size: 0.9375vw;
	margin-bottom: 0.625vw;
	position: relative;
}
.how_to_use .how_to_use_box .box_List p{
	margin: 0;
	font-size: 1.042vw;
	color: #000000;
	line-height: 1.5625vw;
}
.how_to_use .border{
	width: 100%;
	max-width: 36.458vw;
	margin: 0 auto;
	position: absolute;
	top: 52%;
	left: 50%;
	display: flex;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    justify-content: space-around;
}
.how_to_use .border span{
	display: inline-block;
	width: 30%;
	height: 0.052vw;
	border-bottom: 0.052vw dashed rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}
